import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'edit-post', templateUrl: './edit-post.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-post.css'] }) export class EditPostComponent { public static Url: string = 'https://localhost:7080/User/'; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router) { } onClickSubmit() { } }
